thread.title: NFL Week 7 picks: Seahawks-49ers on Thursday Night Football - NFL
thread.title_full: NFL Week 7 picks: Seahawks-49ers on Thursday Night Football - NFL - SI.com

author: OddsShark
title: NFL Week 7 picks: Seahawks-49ers on Thursday Night Football - NFL
text:
by Don Banks Twitter Email Posted: Thu Oct. 22, 2015 NFL's Week 7 kicks off with a matchup of NFC West rivals who just two seasons ago were among the best in the NFL. But now, these 2–4 teams are scrambling to stay out of the division's basement. Can Colin Kaepernick lead the 49ers to a second straight win, or will the Seahawks find a way to halt their losing skid? Don Banks makes his Thursday Night Football pick below.
• Last week: 11-3; Season: 59–32 (.648).
• ​ Best pick in Week 6: San Francisco 27, Baltimore 19 (actual score: 49ers 25–20).
• ​ Worst pick in Week 6: Arizona 26, Pittsburgh 16 (actual score: Steelers 25–13).
• NEW: Week 7 $2M fantasy league. First place wins $150K and top 90K teams win cash! Sponsored by FanDuel
Proving that all 2–4 records are not created equal, the 49ers have lost four of six but feel better about themselves, having beaten visiting Baltimore 25–20 on Sunday and watching QB Colin Kaepernick rebound with six consecutive quality quarters of passing the past two weeks. The Seahawks , on the other hand, are 2–4 and appear to be unraveling before our eyes, with the bewildered defending NFC champions having lost two in a row to Cincinnati and Carolina, blowing sizable fourth-quarter leads in both games.
NFL Video Jets’ low-risk off-season moves pay off as Marshall, Fitzpatrick shine by Greg Bishop
